product.title: ACI Pure Salt
product.description: Spice mixes are blended spices or herbs. ... Blends such as chili powder, curry powder, herbes de Provence, garlic salt, and other seasoned salts are traditionally sold pre-made by grocers, and sometimes baking blends such as pumpkin pie spice are also available.
